/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The trees are bare, suggesting it might be late autumn or early spring. On the right side of the street, buildings rise, their facades bathed in sunlight. A car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of natural beauty and urban architecture.
